Text: wait, the installation completed successfully, but when i tried to play it, it won't run, what's happened? please help.

got the same problem! installed it just fine but the game doesn't run after installation. some kint of message block pops up. if u could then please tell us what we did wrong lor the correct way to istall it and use the patch. any help would be deeply appreciated....

Change your language for non-Unicode programs to Japanese.

ControlPanel - Clock, Lang, Region - Region and Lang - Administrative - Change system locale

Set it to Japanese, restart, and you're good to go.
